DOC.brief_summary: A decrease muscle mass profound impact quality life , lead decrease strength , insulin resistance , low basal metabolic rate obesity . With study investigate whether ingest leucine get ND injection reduce loss muscle mass strength .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Nandrolone Decanoate Leucine Muscle Loss
DOC.criteria: Healthy men 1835 year BMI 18.5 30 kg/m2 ( Family ) history thromboembolic event Smoking Recent surgery ( within 6 month prior study ) Performing progressive resistance training three time per week past year Any back/leg/knee/shoulder complaint may interfere use crutch Current systemic use corticosteroid , anabolic steroid , growth hormone , testosterone , nandrolone , protein supplement , immunosuppressant insulin , blood sugar decrease medication EPO All comorbidities interact mobility muscle metabolism low limb ( e.g . arthritis , spasticity/rigidity , neurological disorder paralysis ) Use anticoagulant Preexisting renal disease potential risk renal dysfunction ( diabetes , hypertension , reduce glomerular filtration rate ) Liver disease Heart failure Migraine Allergy nut soy High blood pressure ( > 140 mmHg systolic > 90 mmHg diastolic ) In case doubt , exclusion subject discuss responsible physician principal investigator .
